commands.name: az keyvault certificate pending delete
commands.summary: Deletes the creation operation for a specific certificate.

commands.name: az keyvault certificate pending merge
commands.summary: Merges a certificate or a certificate chain with a key pair existing on the server.
commands.syntax:
az keyvault certificate pending merge --file
                                      --name
                                      --vault-name
                                      [--disabled {false, true}]
                                      [--tags]

commands.name: az keyvault certificate pending show
commands.summary: Gets the creation operation of a certificate.
